covid-dashboard.name: COVID-19 Dashboard
covid-dashboard.desc: A PWA compatible Web application for Covid-19 pandemic, with visualization of graph, table, and map.

bmi-calculator.name: BMI Calculator
bmi-calculator.desc: A BMI calculator app with features like account binding, historical charts, and health advices.

covid-19-my.name: Malaysia COVID-19 Cases Tracker
covid-19-my.desc: An app that keeps track of the status and its severity of the COVID-19 across Malaysia with features such as heat maps, cards, graphs, and push notifications.
